user.description: Please connect your Selve USB Stick to your system and check the port under Settings -> System -> Hardware -> click on the dots in the top right corner and on Show all Hardware. There you can see all connected devices. Search for an FTDI device and copy its port.
user.title: Instructions for setting up the Selve NG integration.
